definitions.title: v.b.
definitions.body: envelop oneself (Aramaism) (NH id.; Aram. [[עֲטַף]], 9t.ap; Eth. 9t’uf: covered, also n. web, texture);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יַעֲטָף־]] Ps 73:6; 3 mpl. [[יַעַטְפוּ]] Ps 65:13; —envelop oneself: Ps 65:15; the valleys cover themselves with corn (‖[[לָבַשׁ]]); [[־שִׁית חָמָס לָָמוֹ]]´[[יַ]] Ps 73:6 they put on for themselves  (each) a garb of violence.
